about_the_game:
The Night Walkers

This third-person game is inspired by the horror classics of the 90's. Intense and terrifying pace, survive the endless night and stay sane. Reveal through dramas and tragedies the hidden truth about the night walkers and figure out what lurks after death.

Key Features

  • Two playable character
  • Stealth Mechanic
  • Crafting / Trading
  • Non-linear AI
  • Old-school aiming style
  • Adaptive music / Terror
  • Gore & Blood

Read More...

Two Playable Character

  • Inspired by old fashioned genre, choose between a male or a female as you travel your way into the endless night.
  • Different scenario for each characters.
  • Contrasting skills for each characters, which allow a different play style approach.

    Stealth Mechanic

  • What can lurks in the shadows can be awaken by your footsteps.
  • Navigate the streets by making less noise, or fight for your life.
  • A night walker is never alone, they are like wolves and seek the land by hordes.

    Crafting / Trading

  • Craft items to help your journey into the endless night.
  • Trade your shit with other survivors... or steal them.

    Non-linear AI

  • The night walkers behaviour is unpredictable. Their triggered actions are based on random probabilities.
  • If you already ask yourself if they were really dead, this is just the beginning.
  • Fear what is dead and what is not.

    Old-School Aiming Style

  • No cross hair - aim using logic of your weapon movement and direction.

    Adaptive Music / Terror

  • Terror music adapts depending on your distance in-between you and enemies.
  • Feel the incoming danger and the adrenaline to fight against the night walkers.
  • Character fear rises depending of what surrounds him.
  • Fear makes your vision and precision less accurate.
  • Stay calm.

    Gore & Blood

  • Yeah... Of course.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of explicit violence and gore.
